name: The Chosen One
description: You have been revealed as the Chosen One,
destined to save the world from impending darkness.
Embrace your destiny and prove your worthiness
through trials that will test your courage and wisdom.

objectives.receive_blessing: Receive the Blessing of the Ancients

dialogs.start1: The time has come, Chosen One, to prove your worthiness.
dialogs.start2: Three trials await you, each testing a different aspect of your character.
dialogs.start3: Only by completing all trials will you be recognized as the true hero.
dialogs.progress1: You have shown great progress in your trials, Chosen One.
dialogs.progress2: Continue on your path, for the fate of the world rests in your hands.
dialogs.complete1: You have completed all trials and proven yourself worthy!
dialogs.complete2: The blessing of the Ancients is now upon you, true hero.
